page.title: 06RECREATION IN MALVERN WELLS
page.content:
Results of a recreation survey of 70 random households:
{HOURS OF TV WATCHING PER DAY 0:6% l:26% 2:34% 3:l8% >3:l6%
{VISITS never occasional regular {Cinema} 38% 49% 13% {Theatre } 38% 57% 5% {Concert } 43% 51% 6% {Church} 42% 30% 28% {Walk on Hills} l2% 45% 43% {Holiday abroad}41% 35% 24% {3 Counties { annual show}33% 33% 34%
Other{activities and hobbies}include gardening, reading, knitting, sewing, music, visits to the local pub and a wide variety of sports, particularly swimming, tennis and shooting.
